Intro
-----


Workbench 5.2 includes a premium option for Multi-Cloud support. If you have Multi-Cloud enabled and more than one data warehouse available, a cloud warehouse selector is part of the job configuration.  



Selecting a Cloud Warehouse
---------------------------


1. In Workbench 5.2, go to ![dataset_jobs.png](dataset_jobs.png) **DataSet Jobs**.


2. Select ![add_job.png](add_job.png) **Add Job**. 


3. Fill out the **Job Details** section of the **Overview**tab.


4. Fill out the **Domo Details** section of the Overview tab. If your Multi-Cloud connection is configured properly, you should see a field titled **DataSet Cloud**.


5. Select the **DataSet Cloud**field to view the list of possible cloud warehouses.


![dataset_cloud.png](dataset_cloud.png)


6. Select the cloud warehouse you want to write your Workbench job data to.


7. Select **Create**.


7. Finish the job configuration and select ![Screen_Shot_2022-10-12_at_6.16.01_PM.png](Screen_Shot_2022-10-12_at_6.16.01_PM.png) **Save**.


Troubleshooting
---------------


If you cannot see the field for **DataSet Cloud** during job configuration, make sure you have downloaded Workbench 5.2 from the Appstore. 


Confirm that you are connected to an instance of Domo that has Multi-Cloud enabled and that the authenticated Workbench user has the Override Default Cloud grant in the same instance.


If you still cannot see the field, contact [Domo Support](https://domo-support.domo.com/).
